title: Pedagogical Entity-Relationship Modeling for Learning Scenario Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: A classroom environment enabling collaborative activities using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can classify physical/intentional relationships between learning scenario components with over 80% accuracy
Learners can visually represent the structure of learning scenarios using educational entity relationship models
Learners can clearly explain the educational objectives of learning activities by applying intentional relationship types
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
